explains: adv. （程度）相当地，同样地；平均地，相等地；（用于补充观点）同样（重要）地
wordGroup: equally spaced adj. 等距的；等齿距的，等间隔的

sentences.en: Diet and exercise are equally important.
All these techniques are equally effective.
sentences.cn: 所有这些方法都同等有效。

sentences.en: We try to treat every member of staff equally.
sentences.cn: 我们尽可能平等对待每一位工作人员。
